description: Delicious halloumi tartlets with sweet tomato flavours.
name: Halloumi Tart with Tomato & Chilli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 sheets spring roll pastry sheet, cut into quarters

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160Â°C. Quarter the pastry into 4 equal squares. brush each square with melted butter and layer, 5 deep, rotating into a star shape to create the tart base.
In an oiled cupcake tray place the tart base inside. Now place the chutney at the bottom, then the tomatoes, the halloumi and top with chills flakes and seasoning.
Bake in the oven for 10-15 minutes and then serve.
